## Elements of risk

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%" .larger}

General

- Fast flowing river
- River closures
- River restrictions
- Visibility: dawn and dusk
- Pollution

:::


::: {.column width="50%" .larger}
Weather

- Air temperature
- Wind speed
- Water temperature


:::

::::

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="60%"}
Use python with `quarto`

<br/>

Scraping data from a website

- `beautifulsoup4`
- `pandas`

<br/>

Retrieving data from an API

- `requests`
- Or find a package on PyPi (`ea_rivers`)
